article.headline: IPFW 83, Centenary 51
article.story: SHREVEPORT, La. -- Ben Botts hit eight 3-pointers and scored a career-high 30 points and IPFW defeated winless Centenary 83-51 on Thursday night in Summit League play. Botts, who came in leading the Mastodons at 13.6 points a game, was 10 of 15 from the field and 8 of 12 from beyond the arc -- also a career high. IPFW (9-4, 4-0), which has won two in a row, trailed the Gentlemen (0-15, 0-4) by five early, then closed the first half on a 20-3 run to lead 41-22. A 16-3 spurt gave the Mastodons their largest lead, 65-32. They shot 55.2 percent (16 of 29) in the second half. Frank Gaines added 11 points and Jason Smeathers and Jeremy Mixon had 10 each for IPFW. Aaron Harwell scored 13 points and fellow freshman Quin Cooper had 10 -- both career highs -- for Centenary, which shot only 55.6 percent (15 of 27) from the free-throw line. The Mastodons outrebounded the Gentlemen 42-31.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
